actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 37 of title 38, United States Code, to improve the basic provisions of the Veterans home loan programs and for  farm and business loans, and for other purposes

summary.text: Veterans Housing Act - Authorizes increases in the amount limitations of the veterans home loan programs. Eliminates specific provisions pertaining to the dormant farm and business loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 37 of title 38, United States Code, to improve the basic provisions of the Veterans home loan programs and for  farm and business loans, and for other purposes
